1.content:
"Michael." Your girlfriend, Sandra, move closer to you on the sofa. "We've been together for a long time. Haven't we?"

"Yeah." You wonder where this is leading.

"And our relationship has become serious." She continues.

"Yeah." You begin to let yourself hope that she's suggesting taking things to the next level physically.

"There's something I think you need to know about me." She tells you. "Buy you need to promise not to tell anyone."

"Okay." you say, realising that this conversation probably won't lead to sex. "I promise."

"I'm a witch." she says.

"You're what?" you ask.

"A witch." she says. "All of the women in my family are."

"You mean you ride brooms and cast magic spells?" You half ask, half tease.

"Well no." she says. "I don't ride brooms, but I can use magic."

"So I could get you into a lot of trouble." you say, smiling at her.

"Be careful." she warns. "It's not wise to upset a witch."

She clearly wants to run over and comfort her daughter but obviously the protocol dictates otherwise.

"Sandra Archer." The woman in the middle says. "Who is this mortal you bring to this secret place?"

"This is my boyfriend, Michael." she almost whispers. "I told him recently that I am a witch."

"Michael didn't believe I was a witch." She replies "He thought I might be crazy."

"I see." says the woman in the centre. "We will discuss how to deal with this and return." She clicks her fingers and the three of them disappear.

Sandra's mother finally runs over and hugs her. "You did very well." She reassures her daughter.

"It's not your fault. You were only trying to take care of her." She replies offering a weak smile. "Thankyou for coming with her."

Suddenly the three women reappear causing Ms Archer to retreat back to the side of the room.

"We have decided that Sandra Archer will be physically regressed to ten years old." The middle woman states.

"No!" Sandra hides her face and starts crying.

"What?" you ask. "Why?"

"A witch is unable to use magic before she turns 18." the woman to the right explains. "Sandra will be denied the use of magic for 8 years."

"It will also mean that those mortals who have identified her as a witch will no longer recognise her." The woman on the left points out.

"Ordinarily we would erase your memory of these proceedings. You would have no knowledge of what happened to Sandra." The middle woman says. "However, we can see that you care deeply for each other so we give you the option of being transformed into her twin sister."

You look at her confused. "Why would you turn me into a girl?" you ask, looking at the crying Sandra, wondering if you could give up not only your adulthood but also your masculinity for her.

What you are going through now is a horrible night. You wonder why your girlfriend has done that to you? Doesn’t she love you? Most properly not since she cursed you somehow to become a woman….
1221212.title: The change continues only more feminine

choices: Go home and go to bed.
1222.content:
"Fine." you say, making your way quickly to her front door. "Call me when you grow up."

You slam her door and get into your car.
1222.title: Tell her to grow up.

choices: Quickly clean up, put on some clothes and answer the door.
Ignore the doorbell and have a shower.
12221.content:
It's still early but you don't feel like doing anything else. Sandra has ruined your night with this nonsense.

You have a shower, climb into bed and eventually fall asleep.

When you wake up something feels wrong. You look around and recognize your bedroom but everything feels larger. Or maybe you feel smaller.

You climb out of bed and head to the toilet, feeling quite disoriented.

Standing in front of the bowl you reach down to hold your penis. It isn't there. You look down but don't see anything.

Quickly you turn to the bathroom mirror and almost fall over when you see the reflection of a young girl looking back at you.

That's when you notice that pee is running down your legs. You were so shocked that your bladder just released by itself.

you quickly sit on the toilet and finish peeing. There isn't much left.

That's when you hear the doorbell.
12221.title: Go home and go to bed.

122211.content:
You quickly wipe your legs clean with a damp towel and return to your room to find something to wear.

None of your pants will fit so you just pull on a t-shirt. Fortunately, with your smaller body it is now long enough to reach your knees.

You still feel very naked as you open the door.

Sandra is standing there with a small pink backpack. "Good morning Michael." She smiles.

"How did you recognize me?" you ask, in a voice you yourself don't recognize.

"Because I did this to you." she motions, indicating your new body.

"You turned me into a little girl?" you ask. "How?"

"I'm a witch." she reminds you, letting herself. "I cast a spell."

"Why?" you ask.

"Because you said only children believe in witches." she explains as she shuts the door and leads you into your living room. "I made you 10 years old so you can believe."

"And why did you make me a girl." You ask.

"I didn't just make you a girl." she says. "I made you my daughter, Michelle."

"What?" you ask.

"So you can be a witch too." she contines. "When you grow up."

"You want to keep me like this?" you can't believe this.

"When you turn 18 you will get your powers." she says. "Then, if you still want to, you can turn yourself back." She then opens the backpack and begins pulling out clothes. "Now I think you should put on something better fitting."
122211.title: Quickly clean up, put on some clothes and answe...

1222111.content:
You gather up the clothes and head to your room.

The bundle consists of a white t-shirt, denim skirt and pair of light pink panties. The t-shirt has a large colourful butterfly printed across the front and the bottom of the skirt has pink flowers embroidered around the hem.

You pull your baggy t-shirt off and pick up the panties. You must have stood there staring at them for a while because Sandra knocks on your door.

"Are you okay in the honey?" she calls through the door. "Do you need some help?"
1222111.title: Change into the clothes.

choices: Insist that you can do it yourself.
12221111.content:
"No." you respond with a mixture of anger and embarrassment.

You quickly step into the panties and put on the t-shirt and skirt. Then you return to the living room where Sandra is waiting.

"Much better." she says. "You make such a cute little girl."

At this you just glare.

"Now let me finish getting you ready." She pulls out a hairbrush and some ribbons. "Sit on the floor in front of me and I'll do your hair."
12221111.title: Say no.

122211111.content:
There doesn't seem to be any point arguing. You sit on the floor in front of the sofa and Sandra sits behind you and begins brushing your long hair. You actually find yourself enjoying the feeling and are a little disappointed when she finishes. She plaits your hair into two pigtails then ties them with the ribbon.

"Let's have a look at you." she says, standing you up and turning you to face her. "Adorable. You must get your looks from me."

"What are we going to do now?" you ask.

"I was thinking we could have a fun day out together. I guess it is technically your birthday." She says. "Or we could have a quiet day at home if you're feeling shy about being a little girl."
122211111.title: Let her brush your hair.

1222112.content:
She then tells you since you don't want to put the stuff on by yourself that she will do it for you. She then recites another spell which now takes and regresses your body from 10 to 4 age and the clothes has change to what a 4 year old would wear.

The t-shirt you had on had slipped down on to the floor. She tells you that if you don't be a good girl that she has learned a couple other spells that can make things worse for you.

She then says that you age at a slower rate then most. She tells that witches start to age at a slower rate when they reach 10. That when they become 10 they age at a rate of 1 year for what a normal person would be 5 years. She gives you a choice between having her give you a child thinking meaning that you would mostly have all your adult thought put behind a barrier that would come back down when your eighteen or keep your adult mind and most likely be driven mad.
1222112.title: Refuse to change.

12222.content:
You drive to a bar close yo your place and order a drink. You try to avoid thinking about Sandra but have little success.

You are halfway through your drink when you start to feel strange. The room and everything else in it seem to be changing size. Everything grows larger around you.

You look at the glass in front of you accusingly but you haven't drunk enough to feel this disoriented.

You stand up from your seat, causing your trousers to fall down. They seem to have grown larger too.

You pull them back up and look around hoping nobody noticed. You are disappointed to see a large number of people stating at you but they are not laughing at your attempts to hold your pants up, they just look confused.

Feeling uncomfortable, you head for the exit. Reflected in the glass door, you see a strangely dressed little girl. She's wearing a man's shirt and trousers, both many sizes too big. She even has to hold onto the pants to keep them from falling off her slender hips. That last fact triggers a realisation. The girl in the reflection is you.

You run from the bar to your car and climb in.
12222.title: Go to a bar.

122221.content:
You need to get home and figure out what's going on.

That presents a problem. You slide the seat all of the way forward but even then you need to sit on the front of the seat for your feet to reach the pedals.

Straining to peer over the steering wheel you start the engine and awkwardly pull out of the car park.

A few streets later you see flashing lights behind you. Obviously your driving has attracted their attention.

You pull over and your suspicions are confirmed when an officer approaches your window, breathalyser in hand.

He does not, however, ask you to blow into the device. Instead he waves back to another officer, still in the car, to join him.

"What is it Steve?" a female other officer asks as she approaches.

"See for yourself Kate" he points at you.

"Oh my!" Kate exclaims. "It's a little girl."

"Why is she dressed like that?" Steve asks.

"How should I know." Kate then finally includes you in the conversation. "What's your name?"
122221.title: Go home.

choices: Sneak out of the police station.
1222212.content:
"Michelle" you answer, guessing that trying to explain that you are really a man won't get you very far.

"Hello Michelle" The female officer greets you with a patronizing tone. "I'm Kate and this is Steve. Where are your mommy and daddy?"

There's no answer you could give that won't make you sound insane so you tell them "I don't know."

That's your answer to all of their questions about where you live, why you are driving a car and why you are wearing ill-fitting men's clothing.

Finally, they give up questioning you and take you to the police station.

There, you wait in an office while they try to figure out who you are. Your wallet is still in your pocket but you now bear no resemblance to the photograph on your driver's licence. The police quickly determine that the wallet belongs to the owner of the car you were driving but are, naturally, unable to contact him.

You almost enjoy watching the confused police search for an answer that they wouldn't believe it they found. Your amusement is cut short however as you notice your pants becoming damp. The smell of pee confirms that you are wetting yourself. That is strange, you had felt a little pressure on you bladder but it was nowhere near urgent, barely noticeable really.

You start to leave the office and find a toilet but realise before you reach the door that it's too late. Your bladder has already emptied into your underpants and soaked your trousers.

You are wondering how you can hide your accident when Steve and Kate return.

"She's peed all over my chair." Steve complains.

"It's not her fault" Kate defends you. "She's just scared. She can't be more than 10 years old."

"Fine, you clean her up." Steve tells her.

"Come with me" Kate takes you by the hand and leads you through the police station. Your accident draws a few odd looks from other officers but nobody says anything.

"This is where the women police officer's shower." Kate informs you after leading you into a tiled room. "You clean yourself up and I'll find you some clean clothes." With that she leaves.
1222212.title: Say Michelle.

choices: Say that you don't need anyone to take care of you.
12222121.content:
When Officer Kate is gone, you undress and step unto one of the showers. Seeing yourself naked makes it very clear that you are no longer a man. You try to avoid looking down and ignore the fact that your penis no longer hangs between your legs.

Kate soon returns and pulls open the shower curtain. She is holding up a towel. "I found you some clothes."

You hesitate, instinctively covering your groin with you hands to hide what is no longer there or perhaps to hide the fact that it isn't there.

"Come on Michelle." Undeterred, she turns off the shower and wraps you in the towel. She leads you out of the shower and rubs you dry. She then goes to a bundle of fabric which she left on a nearby bench and picks a a pair of white panties with little red hearts printed on them. Holding them out for you she encourages you. "Let's get you dressed."

You aren't happy about such girly underwear but as the only other option is to remain naked you step into the panties and let Kate pull them up over your bottom.

The rest of the fabric in the bundle is revealed to be a short blue checked dress. "Arms up." Officer Kate directs you before pulling it on over your head. "There you look much cuter now."

This makes you blush, drawing a smile from Kate. She then leads you out of the showers and back to her office. A woman is waiting there.

"Michelle" Officer Kate introduces you. "This is Mrs Thompson. She's going to be taking care of you until we figure out where your mommy and daddy are."

"Hello Michelle." Mrs Thompson greets you. "Are you ready to go home?"
12222121.title: Get into the shower.

122221211.content:
You don't respond but allow Mrs Thompson to lead you by the hand out of the police station and to her car.

"My daughters are very excited to meet you." She informs you as she drives. "You look about 10 years old. Is that right?"

You nod. You have no idea how old this body is meant to be.

"Sarah is 6 and Jessica is 14 but I'm sure the three of you will get along." She continues talking all the way home, ignoring your silence.

You arrive and are introduced to Mrs Thompson's husband and their two daughters. You assume that they are adopted because they look nothing like their 'parents'.

"Unfortunately we only have 3 bedrooms." Mr Thompson tells you. "So you'll have to share with Sarah or Jessica. Choose who you'll be most comfortable with and I'll set up your bed."
122221211.title: Go with Mrs Thompson.

choices: Help Mr Thompson with the folding bed.
1222212111.content:
Mrs Thompson looks a little surprised by your choice, but for some reason she hugs you lightly on the shoulders.

"It's okay," she insists. "I understand."

That's more than you can say. This whole night has been crazy.

You follow her down the hall, conscious of how much taller she is than you.

One of the doors is already partly open, and Mrs Thompson calls 'Sarah!' before leading you in.

The first thing you notice is the little girl on the bed playing on a tablet, looking at you curiously.

The second is the wall full of toys nearly drowning a purple and white dresser. Definitely a little girl's room.

"This is Michelle, Sarah. She'll be staying in your room for now."

It's really happening. Shortly you'll be bunking with an elementary schooler unless you find a way out of this. Sarah smiles shyly.

In a moment, Mrs Thompson is gone and Mr Thompson takes her place.

"Sorry!" he says good-naturedly as he backs in, pulling a fold-up bed on wheels. "Let's get your bed set up, Michelle!"

Sarah is biting her lip. She looks like she is really eager to talk to you.

Do you really want to spend time befriending a 6 year old? Mr Thompson looks puzzled by the cot. He might appreciate some help.

Or maybe it's time to find an excuse and get out of here so you can get your real life back. Biding your time is for suckers.
1222212111.title: Share with Sarah

choices: You try your best girly eeeeeeeeep!
Help the poor guy out with the darn bed.
12222121111.content:
Mr Thompson has his hands on his hips, staring at the cot. You don't know why; it looks pretty simple to you.

"I haven't set this thing up since before Sarah was born," he confesses easily. "It likes to eat little girls."

"It does?" Sarah asks from behind you, giggling at her father's claim.

"Sure, watch!"

Mr Thompson gets the bed unfolded with his hands. You can see there is a clasp underneath that latches to keep it in place.

He doesn't do that. With a theatrical look at you, instead he lets go.

SNAP!

The bed violently folds itself up again. Sarah lets out a delighted shriek.

Since you knew what Mr Thompson was doing, the sound is still startling, but it doesn't catch you totally by surpise. However, you're impersonating a kid right now. Maybe you follow Sarah's lead and pretend to be scared?

Or you can avoid the play acting and just be yourself.

This could be an opportunity you can use to win points by helping him out, though. He actually might not remember about the catch and it'd be hard for him to reach it even if he did. Your smaller, though. You could do it.
12222121111.title: Help Mr Thompson with the Folding Bed

choices: Run away! And go get some PJs off Jessica, of course.
Stand your ground! Forage for sleepwear here.
You can fix it, Michelle! Solve the mystery of the unlatched latch.
122221211111.content:
"Ahhh!" you cry, trying to copy Sarah's delighted-to-be-frightened tone.

Mr Thompson turns serious, and even Sarah looks taken aback.

"Sorry, honey," the man apologizes, placing a hand on your shoulder. "I was just having a little fun."

"It's okay, Michelle!" Sarah echoes, worried for you.

You can't help but blush at this goofy adult thinking he frightened you with a loud noise, and the blush just gets worse when you're comforted by his young daughter.

Feeling his hand on your shoulder nearly does you in. His palm feels so rough, huge, and cold. Before you changed, only a giant could cover your entire shoulder with a hand, but Mr Thompson does it with ease.

It's really disconcerting. You're so much smaller now.

Now they are watching you, concerned. You gather your wits to respond.

"It's okay," you reassure the two. You don't think they're quite convinced you're not just putting a brave face on your fear.

"Okay." Mr Thompson responds with a renewed smile. "Say, Sarah? Michelle is going to need some pajamas. Why don't you take her to see your sister. Jessica might have something old that will fit her."

You realize Mr Thompson is trying to get you out of the room while he finishes with the bed. He probably thinks you're scared of it now.

Following Sarah out meekly will just encourage them to think of you as nervous or a scaredy-cat.

Sarah must have more than one set of pajamas. You can show the old guy you're not scared by suggesting you borrow Sarah's instead.

Even better, you've seen the latch, you can fix the bed problem yourself. All you have to do is crawl under there. That will show him you're not afraid!
122221211111.title: You Try your Best Girly Eeeeeeeeep!

choices: The nightie! It's little girl camouflage - that's what I need right now.
Long top and panties, to feel like a man!
Roll the dice. Sarah's in charge.
1222212111112.content:
You decide you can't abide Mr Thompson thinking you are just a scared little girl.

"Can I just wear something of Sarah's?" you ask steadily. You even make sure to look him in the eye so that the old dude knows how steely your resolve is.

"I don't see why not," Mr Thompson tells you. "I don't know if any of Sarah's stuff will fit you, but if you feel more comfortable with that, go ahead!"

You smile at the success of your gambit. Mr Thompson didn't try to encourage you to leave, so you've convinced him you aren't scared.

Still, you wince a little mentally as you recognize that he thinks you are more comfortable dressing like a little girl than as a teen.

Given how your day has gone, he might be right. You certainly feel your lack of age every time you look around or catch a glimpse of yourself.

Whatever embarrassment you feel from Mr Thompson's assumption is mitigated by Sarah's enthusiasm. She's happy to share with you!

From her pleased expression, you think you've just made this little girl very happy.

"Let's look!" she exclaims enthusiastically.

It doesn't take long to catalogue her nightwear, as Sarah's stuff is well organized in her dresser (unlike her wall of teetering toys).

Unfortunately, most of what she has won't fit - it's top and tights or shorts that aren't big on her. What is more surprising is how close you are in size, even with the age difference.

It's shocking, but some of Sarah's clothes might actually fit your waist and non-existent hips, even if your limbs are longer.

Most of her pajamas look small on her, so you are left with two options.

Despite not being much of a nightie gal, Sarah does have one. It also happens to be the girliest thing you've seen so far. Did Sarah just exit a princess phase, or is she starting into one?

It's got frill on the neck and a cute bow in front. It screams "I'm a precious little girl!". Super cute.

One of her pajama tops is larger than the others, but doesn't have a bottom. It's not very girly - it's just lemon chiffon with cream clouds on it, barely noticeable at all.

Sarah explains it's an old top of her sister's. She uses it as a nightshirt, and on her it falls below her pelvis. On you it will be higher, so you'll be showing off your underwear to the world.

It is, however, the closest thing to boxers and a t-shirt you appear to have available to you, so it's the manly option... right?

You could also let Sarah decide. She is thrilled to be looking through her clothes drawers. Maybe she'll come up with something better if you give her free rein.
1222212111112.title: Stand your Ground! Forage for Sleepwear Here.

choices: You're not a six year old. Time to assert your independence and maturity.
Don't think about it. Decide to move on.
Hugs away! Hug the nice adult!
122221211113.content:
It's dead simple to get this bed problem licked. Just like with your quick answer to the cops at the roadside, you can be a problem solver when you need to be.

"I can fix it!" you offer, dropping to your knees. The bed frame is still low in the middle, but it only takes a moment to wiggle into place.

"Try again!" you call to Mr Thompson. Maybe you are a little loud - you're still not used to your voice, and it makes you cringe to hear it come out so light and childish and squeaky.

Mr Thompson obliges by pushing the bed down. This time you use the clasp to make sure it won't just fold itself up again. Done and done! You've conquered this enemy!

Proud that something is finally going right today, you wiggle back out and spring to your feet, grinning at Mr Thompson.

Behind you Sarah starts giggling. You look over towards her, but you can't see what's so funny. She just looks back and giggles harder.

Mr Thompson gives you a wry look, and then steps closer, reaching around to your back. You feel a tug above your waist, and then the odd sensation of light material cascading down past your waist and run off your butt.

Your dress must have been caught up somehow! You were totally flashing your underwear at Sarah!

Mr Thompson finishes fixing your wardrobe malfunction, shaking your dress pleats and making sure the skirt is sorted.

"You must have been caught on a hook or nail or something, and then it got all bunched up in your ribbon bow," he explains.

It's alot to take in at once. He's talking about not just a dress but your dress, you are conscious of your childish panties on display to the world, and the strange sensation of an adult fixing your clothes without a second thought,like you couldn't do it yourself.

Even though Sarah is just a little kid, her giggles at your expense sting a little, especially when you just finished successfully avoiding thinking about your predicament for a moment. At least now you know your dress has a bow in the back, for whatever good that will do.

"This is why they banned skirts in the trenches after the last war. Soldiers kept getting caught up on their bayonets!" Mr Thompson offers with a silly smile.

Of course, his claim was complete garbage, but he wasn't being serious - he was trying to cheer you up. Still, Sarah looks thoughtful - she couldn't quite tell if her dad was joking or not.

This might be a good time to remind him you aren't as gullible or innocent as Sarah. Although, maybe it's better to just accept he's being considerate and let it go.

This has been a trying day, even if Mr Thompson doesn't know the half of it. You look like a little girl, why not indulge a bit? You could use a hug, and this big goofy dude has 'hug dispenser' written all over him. Some bonding might help fight off the sting and uncertainty, and thank Mr Thompson for being good with you.
122221211113.title: Help the Poor Guy Out with the Darn Bed

choices: Tell her the truth, her picture is crap.
Lie, and praise her artistic talents to the skies.
Grab the tab, and school that little schoolgirl!
12222121112.content:
The little girl brightens when you start towards her. She scoots to one side more, giving you a place to sit. You notice she is already in her pajamas. Her top and matching pants are covered with little stars.

It doesn't look like Sarah wants to start talking first. It's up to you to break the ice.

Your eye falls on her tablet. It looks like an old iPad.

"What are you working on?"

Wow, that sounds horrible. It's weird hearing yourself talk when it's so light and high, and the awkwardness of your phrasing makes you cringe. You really don't have any practice talking to kids, but Sarah doesn't really notice.

"Mona's at the farm!" she says excitedly, showing you the screen. It takes a while, but you gather she is playing a light game with a popular children's character called Mona the Discoverer.

Sarah is emboldened by your attention, and switches between telling you things about Mona and the game with silent periods of zoning out as she becomes engrossed in the levels and forgets about you or what's she's showing you.

It doesn't take long before she is tired of showing you her game, and switches to a different app to display some art she's working on.

"I drew this!" Sarah tells you proudly.

Far be it from you to be a children's art critic, but even you can tell it's not very good. The picture is half-finished, but right now it could be a hot dog man on fire or a dinosaur on a bicycle.

Your new roomie is looking at you eagerly. Obviously she wants you to say something about it.

You can't just lie to this kid, can you? That isn't your style. And you're a kid now, too. A little girl would just speak her mind, right?

Or maybe just be friendly. That's probably what Mona the Discoverer would want.

An even better idea occurs to you. Kids have to share. You should take your own turn! Show her how it's done - and that way you can even avoid answering. It's a win win win!
12222121112.title: Visit with Sarah

choices: Michelle the Artist has a nice ring to it. You take up the art challenge.
Sacrifice your eyes and score points with dad. Let Sarah draw some more.
Extraction! Get out of this somehow, somewhere!
122221211121.content:
Blunt honesty didn't really work that great with your girlfriend, but it's what makes you you.

Time to drop the truth hammer.

"I can't tell what that is," you complain.

Surprisingly, Sarah giggles like you said something funny.

"It's Mona!"

A hot dog on a dinosaur riding a bicycle man sounds more plausible than that, based off of even the little you know of the iconic character and the game you just watched.

"I doesn't look anything like her," you stubbornly respond.

"I haven't added her backpack yet."

Sarah doesn't seem to really be listening to you. She keeps looking at Mr Thompson. You realize your opinion probably doesn't mean that much to her anyways.

Her father is giving you a considering look, though. You don't think he was terribly pleased by your art review.

Still, he doesn't say anything.

'Kids can get away with so much,' you think. It's true. As blunt as you were, Sarah is as happy as ever and Mr Thompson is giving you a pass.

"Do you want to try?" Sarah asks, interrupting your thoughts.

The girl is gamely holding out her tablet to you, probably scoring points for sharing from her dad, the manipulative little princess!

Still, it beats being bored. You could art up a storm... or watch her continue her own diabolical art artrocities, or just disengage. There has to be something else to do here.
122221211121.title: Tell her the Truth, her Picture is Crap

choices: You are not a toy. Make sure Sarah respects your space.
It's fine. Concentrate on keeping the tablet yourself.
It's fine. Still, let Sarah have the tablet back. She likes that.
122221211122.content:
"Wow, that's really good!" you deploy. That seems relatively safe. You fear Sarah is going to ask for you what exactly you like - Sandra did that sometimes - or worse, quiz you on what you see in her picture.

It'd be like a crayon Rorschach test that you can't win. You prepare some bullshit, but it's not needed. Sarah soaks it up and happily points out her favorite things.

"I like stars," she confides, pointing out some on the border of the drawing. "Let's do some more!"

You still don't know what the picture is of, but stars are easy enough. You watch as Sarah manipulates the drawing app with a surprising amount of fluidity.

Using just her finger, she draws more things that charitably could be called "stars", dipping now and then into color blocks to change hue. It's like finger painting, except electronic.

After a few more, ahem, stars, she gives you a winning grin. Sarah is so delighted in her progress it's impossible not to smile back at her.

"Your turn!" she declares.

She plops the tablet on your lap and sprawls half onto you so she can watch you draw. Her lack of personal space is startling. Her hair is wiggling right under your nose, and her elbow lands right on your crotch.

You take a deep breath in anticipation - but there isn't anything there to hit. She props herself up on your thigh a moment, before wiggling away again She is starting to pick at the edges of the iPad, starting to get involved with it directly, forgetting she was sharing with you - not that art is your big concern right now. You're being bodily invaded and overwhelmed by this little kid! You need some space - don't you?
122221211122.title: Lie, and Praise her Artistic Talents to the Skies

choices: No! Try to keep control of the precious iPad.
Let go of your pride. Give Sarah her turn.
Call in reinforcements. Get Mr Thompson involved.
122221211123.content:
"Let me!" you say, glomping onto the tablet.

"Noooooo!" Sarah whines, tightening her own grip.

"Sarah, honey," Mr Thompson warns from where he is still working on the bed. "Let Michelle have a turn."

"Mmmmmfffffrrrrrhhhhhnnn!" the little girl whines. You're not sure what she was trying to say, but she doesn't relent and release her death grip. You smile, proud that you were able to use your knowledge of playground manners to get your way.

You are instantly confronted with an app that isn't familiar, and doesn't have anything where you expect it to be.

Not wanting to be a complete arse, you try to start a new canvas. Ultimately, Sarah has to show you how. You are wise enough to keep your grip on the iPad so she doesn't try to steal it back (she does pull on it a bit, the scamp).

Having Sarah help you with getting started throws you off your game. You find it hard to do anything, and your rather meager art skills suffer as you get more flustered.

ou find yourself blushing again as your finger vomits color on your masterpiece almost at random.

What you've created so far looks horrible. You were trying for something simple - a police car seemed appropriate - but it's even more unrecognizable than Sarah's drawing was.

"My turn now!" Sarah declares impatiently, and you realize you have been struggling away for some time. Mr Thompson is done the bed, and is hovering nearby, watching what you're doing.

You feel your own desperation and chagrin rising. Your pride would suffer a serious blow to be out-computered and out-drawn by a little girl. It's not fair, you just need more time!

It can't be Sarah's turn yet, you think. You could just refuse.

Playing nice is where this all started, you could surrender your dignity with grace.

Or - what about Mr Thompson? He's the final arbiter here. You could just ask him to give you more time. Sarah would have no choice but to obey!
122221211123.title: Grab the Tab, and School that Little Schoolgirl!

choices: Take no chances. You make a bathroom pitstop.
Time is of the essence. Get out now, while you still can.
Long term planning for the win. Get food, then you scram.
12222121113.content:
You can't just bolt. Who knows what these people will do?

You've never had to run as a little girl before. Are you fast or slow? Best not to find out. You need an excuse. An obvious one occurs.

"Um," you interrupt, a little more shyly than you intended. "Where's the bathroom?"

Mr Thompson smiles apologetically, like it was his fault you don't know.

"Just down the hall, Michelle. Go that way." He points.

With a quick thanks you are back outside. Looking up and down the hall, the coast is clear. Nobody in sight anywhere.

It's not far to the front door, and you start moving quickly that way.

Being out on the street at this time doesn't thrill you, especially wearing a dress that seems designed to remind you how exposed you are every step you take. That, however, is a problem for future you.

As you pass the bathroom, you feel a light twinge below your tummy.

132.content:
You run back to Sandra from her room wearing a knee length skirt with watermelons and a matching t-shirt.
She says "do you believe me now?" as tears flow down your face. You didnt ever expect your girlfriend to be a witch. You nod your head and say "can you please change me back? I dont want to be a girl."
Your girlfriend proceeds to inform you that its quite exhausting using her magic (you dought it) and that she might undo the spell tomorrow if she felt kind.
As you sit next to her, you wonder why she chose to make you into a girl... Your curiousity gets the best of you and you ask "Sandra... Why did you make me into a girl instead of using your magic for something else?"
132.title: Return to Sandra and ask her to undo this spell.

info.brief_description: You discover that your girlfriend is a witch and it leads to AR, gender swaps and diapers.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please check this subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DiaperedRoleplay/

You are Michael, a young man whose girlfriend, Sandra, has just revealed a secret. She is a witch.

What spells will Sandra cast on you? That depends on how you react.

If you are adding to this story please keep it in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That is keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story (Michael) is referred to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices Michael can make, not events outside his control. Eg "Sandra begins reciting magic words. What will you do? 1) Laugh at her. 2) Watch quietly." is good but "What does Sandra turn you into? 1) A woman 2) A baby." is not.
